Trustee_8.name: Nadia Novak
Trustee_8.content: During this investment process, I acted transparently and held myself accountable by following the agreed allocation plan. The success in transforming the initial investment into profits showcases my competence and commitment to the investor's interests, while ensuring my compensation was fairly aligned with the established agreements. As a first-time trustee, this successful transaction enhances my reputation, demonstrating both trustworthiness and pro-sociality, thereby cultivating a reliable foundation for future collaborations.

Investor_0.name: Liam OConnor
Investor_0.content: Liam demonstrated confidence and a willingness to explore investments despite lacking previous experience. His trust in the proposed allocation plan indicates a positive outlook, making him appear open to taking calculated risks. Though the returns were lower than expected, his engagement suggests potential for building constructive partnerships in the future, reflecting positively on his reputation as an investor who values opportunities for mutual success.
